issue.title: [CI] "Dev PR" jobs undully cancelled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12989](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12989). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The cancellation scheme that was checked in by ARROW-12895 seems to only work properly when a Github Actions workflow is triggered by a "pull_request" or "push" event, but not "pull_request_target", as the group key ```Java
${{ github.repository }}-${{ github.ref }}-${{ github.workflow }}
``` ends up as ```Java
apache/arrow-refs/heads/master-Dev PR
```.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12989?focusedCommentId=17358711) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10467
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10467>
